message.dragon_slayer_item: Looks like you dont have enough 'Strength' to lift a sword.
message.stimulator_overdose: You got an overdose. You need to take a rest for 10 minutes.
message.stimulator_he_overdose: He got an overdose. You need to take a rest for 10 minutes.
message.exp_stimulator_he_overdose: He got an overdose. You need to take a rest for 30 minutes.
message.exp_stimulator_overdose: He got an overdose. You need to take a rest for 30 minutes.
message.exp_stimulator_success: You got extremely lucky, and you became a demi-god for a 30 seconds
message.exp_stimulator_he_success: He got extremely lucky, and he became a demi-god for a 30 seconds
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item: Applies on hit with 25% chance next effects for 30 seconds:
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item2: Attacking player additional apply a glowing effect for 60 seconds.
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item3: Press SHIFT+RMB to entity in 12 block radius to teleport behind
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item4: him, gain Invisible III, Damage Resistance for 3 seconds and
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item5: Guaranteed Crit effect for 10 seconds with x2.5 damage.
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item6: Teleport consumes 8 durability each time. Reload - 10 seconds.
tooltip.amethyst_dagger_item7: Guaranteed Crit - make your first attack critical
tooltip.dragon_slayer_item1: Requires Strength effect to use. With 50% applies Slowness II and
tooltip.dragon_slayer_item2: Armor Shred IV, players get additional Confusion effect, for 30 seconds.
tooltip.dragon_slayer_item4: Armor Shred - reduces armor for 10% each level of debuff.
tooltip.regeneration_stimulator_item: Applies Regeneration II for 30 seconds on use with 90% chance.
tooltip.speed_stimulator_item: Applies Speed II for 30 seconds on use with 90% chance.
tooltip.strength_stimulator_item: Applies Strength II for 30 seconds on use with 90% chance.
tooltip.exp_stimulator_item: Applies all buffs VI with 20% chance for 30 seconds, other 80% debuffs.
tooltip.ultimate_stimulator_item: Applies Regeneration, Strength, Speed and Damage Resistance IV for 30 seconds
